name: Overgrown Evil
description:
If the game won't play on your browser, you can download the executable below

_____________________________________

You are a gardener tasked with pulling out weeds on your lawn, while pulling weeds, one of the weeds suddenly change into something... otherworldly...

You try to pluck the weed(?) and you suddenly get transported into somewhere else...

Another place filled with weeds, and despite your confusion, as a gardener you will fulfill your job even in this strange place. 

 However, you haven't realized , you aren't alone

_____________________________________

How To Play: 

WASD: Move character

Left Click: Pull grass

Meet the team

Artist - Ricky Fields

Developer - Andrew Choi

Sound Producer - Nathaniel Greiner

Playtester - Richard Lee
